title: Article 1 - Standards for Training, Subsistence and Transportation Allowances Under Article 23-A of the Labor Law
content:
Article 1 - Standards for Training, Subsistence and Transportation Allowances Under Article 23-A of the Labor Law

State Regulations

Part 620 - Training Allowances (§ 620.1 to 620.2)

Part 621 - Subsistence Allowances (§ 621.1 to 621.2)

Part 622 - Transportation Allowances (§ 622.1 to 622.3)

Part 623 - Overpayments (§ 623.1 to 623.2)

Part 624 - Disqualifications (§ 624.1 to 624.3)

Part 625 - Hearings And Appeals (§ 625.1)

Part 626 - General (§ 626.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
